attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister & Alan Johnson & the UK goverment to keep Gary McKinnon in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We now call for action we need to safeguard people with Autism in the UK, and we call upon he Government to take action, and let Gary to be tired in the UK

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
